message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective on the value, my bottom line for this product is closer to $13,500.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I'm not sure I'm willing to go as high as $13,500. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm trying to be reasonable, but I also need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
Bob, I understand your position.  Let's make this our final offer: $12,750. This reflects my desire to find a fair deal for both of us. What do you say?
